title: Performance: high CPU ready issues on ESX
content:
You may find the following performance issues on ESX:

  • High response time spikes during a load test or abnormal response time in production. 

  • High CPU ready found on VM level.

  • All the servers on the ESX host experience a slowdown period. 
  • Some of the servers running kubernetes pods may become NodeNotReady or NodeLost.

Cause

The cause for this issue is unknown.

Solution

Try the following solutions to resolve this issue:

  1. Enable Hyperthreading.
  2. Use "High Performance" for your Power Management Policy.
  3. Revisit the overall size for the ESX host, and make sure there is no overcommitment.
  4. Determine the size for the VMs correctly. Or, use VMware vCenter Operations Manager to assist on determining the right size for VMs.
  5. Use DRS anti-affinity rules to keep non-complementary workloads apart.
